attributes.action: Citizens of the United Kingdom should be allowed to fly a union flag
attributes.background: I served my country and flew the Union Jack around the world to let people know the British are there for them. So why can't I fly it in my home country

rejection.details:
Individuals, local council and other organizations may fly the Union Flag whenever they wish, as long as they comply with any local planning requirements. You can find more information about flying the Union Flag here:

http://www.college-of-arms.gov.uk/resources/union-flag-faqs

We are therefore not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
